cont.entity_a: Great sound quality with clean acoustics and crisp bass. Not the best for bass enthusiasts; other models offer better bass output.
Comfortable fit for long durations, even for glasses wearers.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable clip-on design, more so than earbuds. Secure fit during workouts, but may cause chafing in hot weather.

cont.entity_a: Sound leakage due to open-ear design, not ideal for quiet environments.
cont.entity_b: Retractable cord is convenient but only one side retracts.

cont.entity_a: Durable over many years despite minor plastic cracking.
cont.entity_b: Durability concerns with thin cables and non-retracting wire. Mixed experiences with durability; some units failed quickly.

cont.entity_a: Long cable can be cumbersome but is replaceable.
Good value for the price, especially with modifications for enhanced bass.
Suitable for a wide range of music genres and uses.
cont.entity_b: Good for everyday listening, but not ideal for noisy environments.

cont.entity_a: Sennheiser provides good customer service for replacements.
Requires an adapter for 3.5 mm devices, which can be awkward.
